translation: A virulent attacker who prevents healing and passes negative effects to his targets.
A massive brute that gains strength at the expense of vulnerability.
An aggressive soldier who sacrifices healing for rapid attacks.
A focused healer who applies and removes negative effects.
A resilient guard who taunts while healing herself and slowing her enemies.
A master thief skilled at disabling powerful opponents with the help of his Pym Particle powered suit.
A powerful sorcerer who weakens his enemies with forbidden magic.
An agile, relentless hunter who shreds his enemies with rapid attacks.
A stealthy saboteur who steals enemy advantages and delivers disabling attacks.
A ruthless mercenary who takes down single targets with focused damage and perfect accuracy.
A time-traveler from the future who can manipulate turn order and charge up attacks to blast his enemies.
A resilient leader who provides energy to his team while blocking enemy attacks.
A powerful cosmic soldier who breaks down the defenses of multiple foes and gains overwhelming power in Binary form.
An insane brawler that viciously tears through foes with negative effects, attacking more frequently as their health decreases.
A vengeful, die hard bruiser with a devastating explosion attack.
A tough bruiser who delivers bonus attacks, chain attacks, and counterattacks.
A magical unicorn who specializes in stab-shooting vulnerable targets.
Sorcerer Supreme and versatile healer with the ability to remove effects from friends and foes.
An unpredictable, taunting attacker with rapid attacks that drain health.
A stealthy assassin capable of dealing immense damage to a single target.
A soldier who excels at War and deals massive damage to enemies who have multiple positive effects.
An aggressive warrior who can attack again after defeating an enemy.
A resilient healer who defends allies and has a chance to revive. Protective of Rocket Raccoon.
A quick attacker who prevents healing on a single target.
A sword-wielding ninja who assails his target with multiple attacks.
A deadly archer who can clear effects off the enemy team.
A mystical healer who drains health when attacking.
An expert martial artist who conceals his allies with smoke bombs.
An expert archer who delivers unavoidable attacks to disable his foes.
An incredibly tough taunter who gets stronger when damaged.
Hydra special weapons experts deliver explosive grenade attacks.
Hydra assault troops overwhelm enemies with storms of bullets.
Hydra snipers take careful aim before shooting to ensure perfect accuracy.
Hydra scientists use experimental treatments to heal their comrades.
The most loyal and resilient Hydra guards are trained to sacrifice themselves for the cause.
A versatile martial artist with healing abilities and a powerful single target attack.
A versatile damage dealer with high armor and low health.
A resilient fighter who removes positive effects from enemies and clears negative effects from allies.
An unstoppable tank who taunts his foes and charges for devastating damage.
A lethal assassin who drains health from enemies and eliminates weakened targets.
A demanding crime boss who summons bodyguards and orders allies to attack.
A relentless tracker who uses cybernetic enhancements to mark and disable his targets.
The elite classes of Kree society order others to vanquish their enemies.
An elite warrior armed with cybernetics that enhance speed, and strength.
A vicious hunter who doesn't give her prey a chance to recover.
A purifier who utilizes Kree technology to regenerate and cleanse his allies.
A heavily armored Kree warrior who intercepts attackers with brutal counterattacks.
The Asgardian god of Mischief who misleads and confuses his foes.
An extremely tough taunting protector with high damage and health.
A master of magnetic fields who can shift enemy positions and empower his Brotherhood allies.
A cosmic healer who can stun foes and redistribute health to an injured ally. Her abilities are stronger in Raids.
The noble leader of the Jabari tribe who protects his own and relentlessly assaults his enemies.
A versatile soldier who can inflict area damage with grenades.
An expert marksman who can deliver high damage with a single shot.
A field combat leader who makes allies faster and stronger.
A tough fighter who draws fire and reduces incoming damage.
A bodyguard who distracts enemies to protect allies.
A brilliant Kree geneticist that uses her mastery of biology to weaken foes and replenish her allies.
A plucky Super Hero brawler who assists and generates ability energy for her allies.
A covert shapeshifter skilled at disabling stealthed targets and manipulating enemies into attacking each other.
A ruthless attacker who assails opponents with frequent attacks.
The legendary leader who spreads advantages to allies and summons S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.
An excellent healer who is able to deploy a wide variety of health restoration abilities.
A mysterious ninja master who summons Hand Ninjas and specializes in ambushing his opponents.
The general of the Dora Milaje who uses precision attacks to break down enemy defenses.
A vicious blaster who deals high piercing damage to multiple targets.
A hotheaded fire-starter who excels at burning enemies in an area to inflict damage over time.
A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent who disrupts the enemy team by weakening groups of foes and removing their advantages.
A heavily armed space pirate who supports his allies with plasma cannon fire.
A spacefaring doctor who prioritizes healing the most severe wounds over those that will merely leave a cool scar.
A boarding expert who uses an energy shield to deflect attacks.
The leader of Hydra who commands Hydra troops to fire on his enemies.
An armored hero who protects allies with her barrier and enhances Power Armor allies' attacks.
An aggressive scrapper who inflicts terrible damage to foes at range. Prefers to team up with Groot.
An aggressive scrapper who inflicts terrible damage to foes at range. Prefers to team up with Groot.
A Kree fanatic who summons Kree minions while denying the abilities of his foes with brutal strikes.
A savage, regenerating brute that shreds single targets and chains to additional enemies.
A mystical controller that prolongs negative effects and redistributes health across her teammates.
A mad scientist who converts negative effects to positive effects while healing her allies.
A jetpack assault soldier who provides air cover with area attacks.
S.H.I.E.L.D.'s frontline soldiers hold the line with defensive tactics and counterattacks.
A S.H.I.E.L.D. agent trained to provide emergency medical attention in the field.
An agent who specializes in protecting vulnerable VIP's with stealth and emergency medical aid.
A non-lethal combat specialist with a protective shield and a baton that stuns opponents.
A scientific genius who uses her Vibranium-powered tech to heal those in need and power up her fellow Wakandans.
A quick attacker that weakens opponents and evades incoming attacks.
A charismatic leader who generates ability energy for allies and distracts enemies.
A powerful weather controller that charges up devastating attacks to lead her mutant allies to victory.
A Titan Eternal who delivers crushing blows that drain his foes and taunt his enemies.
The God of Thunder who deals great damage and weakens multiple foes.
A Kree warlord and eternal who generates overwhelming energy blasts and force fields.
A powerful robotic tyrant that summons drones to eliminate any threat to his mechanical regime.
A fierce villain who strips positive effects from his foes with fire and explosives.
Miles Morales controls the field with web blasts and electrical shocks that prolong negative effects and apply Disrupted.
An Ultron drone who generates protective force fields.
An Ultron drone who blasts targets with devastating heat rays.
An Ultron drone who attacks targets rapidly with high-velocity rail guns.
An Ultron drone who deploys nanobots to reconstruct allies.
An Ultron construction drone who taunts enemies to absorb damage.
A symbiotic monstrosity that tears into opponents and spreads harmful effects.
A synthetic being that avoids enemy attacks and disables his foes.
An armored soldier who uses an arsenal of weapons to bombard his foes. More powerful in Alliance Wars.
A highly elusive blaster capable of stunning and chaining to multiple opponents.
An elite Hydra agent who assaults his chosen target with deadly attacks that prevent healing.
A mutant armed with adamantium claws that ignore armor and tear through his opponents.
A leader who can summon Ravager allies and deliver high piercing damage.
A.I.M. operator who coordinates the team.
A stealthy saboteur who steals enemy advantages and delivers disabling attacks.
Sorcerer Supreme and versatile healer with the ability to remove effects from friends and foes.
Hand ninja who can coordinate events around them.
Hydra communications officer who can manipulate his surroundings.

Kree officer in charge of operations.
